content: Anchored in the heart of Ocean Drive on 6th, the Celino Hotel is just steps to everywhere you want to be. Located beachfront in the heart of South Beach on the southern end of iconic Ocean Drive next to the SoFi neighborhood, steps from the Atlantic Ocean and with direct access to downtown Miami and the Port of Miami via MacArthur Causeway. The Celino is less than seven miles from Miami’s top urban destinations including Wynwood, Brickell, Midtown and just blocks from South Pointe Park, Lincoln Road and Española Way.
